name: NZ Alpine & Agriculture Encounter
openingHours: The Heritage Centre is open 9-5pm Weekdays and 10-4pm Weekends. The collection is on display in the 'New Zealand Alpine & Agriculture Encounter', a visitor attraction located within the building.

offers.description:
$17.50 per adult, $14.00 students & Senior Citizens, $10 per child. Family Pass $48.00. Children under 5 - Free.

Note: Currently operating under Methven KIDS4FREE promotion. (Children 10 years and under for free if accompanied by an adult).
